SELECT A.LOC_SEQ , BOOK_STRT_DT , BOOK_END_DT , BOOK_REQ_DT , BOOK_CD , B.NAME AS locNm , CMN_CD AS bookSttsCd , CMN_NM AS bookSttsNm , A.NAME , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(A.TEL), 'grape') TEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(EMAIL), 'grape') EMAIL , BOOK_AMT , DC_AMT , PAY_AMT , REQ_CNTS FROM BOOK A INNER JOIN LOCATION B ON A.LOC_SEQ = B.LOC_SEQ INNER JOIN CMN_CODE C ON A.BOOK_STTS_CD = C.CMN_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.BOOK_CD = #{bookCd}
